channel.title: CERICT-Università Di Salerno on CS-AWARE-NEXT
channel.description: Recent content in CERICT-Università Di Salerno on CS-AWARE-NEXT

item.title: Welcome CS-Connect!
item.description: Welcome CS-Connect! In CS-AWARE-NEXT, the role of our unit, CERICT-Università di Salerno, is to design, develop and evaluate, a collaboration layer for the ecosystem, aimed to support the organisations in their activities toward improved security. We are actually collecting all the requirements from the use cases and we have had very interesting discussions with the organisations in the ecosystems in Larissa and in Foggia, to find out what is actually needed to ensure adequate support to the ecosystem.
